Commentary.Commentary: First Half begins.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
DeAndre Yedlin (Newcastle United) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Cuco Martina (Everton).
Attempt blocked. Matt Ritchie (Newcastle United) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Corner,  Newcastle United. Conceded by Morgan Schneiderlin.
Attempt missed. Florian Lejeune (Newcastle United) header from the left side of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Matt Ritchie with a cross following a corner.
Commentary.Shot where: the left side of the box

Commentary.Commentary: Offside, Newcastle United. Mohamed DiamÃ© tries a through ball, but Matt Ritchie is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Idrissa Gueye (Everton) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Gylfi Sigurdsson.
Attempt blocked. Mikel Merino (Newcastle United) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Jonjo Shelvey.
Attempt saved. Matt Ritchie (Newcastle United) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
Foul by Dwight Gayle (Newcastle United).
Idrissa Gueye (Everton) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Matt Ritchie (Newcastle United) hits the left post with a left footed shot from the left side of the box.
Attempt saved. Aaron Lennon (Everton) header from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Dominic Calvert-Lewin with a cross.
Goal!  Newcastle United 0, Everton 1. Wayne Rooney (Everton) right footed shot from very close range to the bottom left corner.
Foul by Idrissa Gueye (Everton).

Mikel Merino (Newcastle United) hits the right post with a left footed shot from outside the box. Assisted by Javier Manquillo.
Offside, Everton. Dominic Calvert-Lewin tries a through ball, but Wayne Rooney is caught offside.
Attempt saved. Gylfi Sigurdsson (Everton) header from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Jonjoe Kenny with a cross.
Aaron Lennon (Everton) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jonjo Shelvey (Newcastle United).
Jonjo Shelvey (Newcastle United) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Attempt saved. Dwight Gayle (Newcastle United) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Christian Atsu.
First Half ends, Newcastle United 0, Everton 1.
